text: Youtai jiaotu zhong you yiqun ren cuangai jing wen, tamen shuo: Women ting er bu cong, yuan ni ting'erbuwen, la yi na, zhe shi yinwei qiao fang manma, feibang zhengjiao. Jiaruo tamen shuo: Women ji ting qie cong, ni ting ba, wen zhu er na, zhe dui tamen shi geng hao de, shi gengzheng de. Dan zhenzhuyin tamen bu xindao er qi jue tamen, gu tamen chu shaoshu ren wai dou bu xindao.
